  Found [even] with compatible type.
  Success 1: [even] seems correct.
  Found [odd] with compatible type.
  Success 1: [odd] seems correct.
Question 2
  Found [merge] with compatible type.
  Failure: [merge] is incorrect.
    When applied to the following arguments:
    
     | [1]
    
     | [0]
    it produces the following invalid result:
    [[1; 0]] A valid result is:
    
     | [0; 1]
